column2: "Na mepɛ dɛ hom hu aper dzendzen a miridzi no wɔ hom nye hɔn a wɔwɔ Laodikea
column3: nye hɔn a wonnhun m'enyim wɔ honam mu no nyina ho;"

column2: "dɛ wɔmma hɔn akoma ntɔ hɔn yamu
column3: wɔntoatoa mu kor wɔ ɔdɔ mu
column4: nnya ntseasee a woesi no tadua ahonya nyina
column5: ama woeehu Nyankopɔn esumasɛm no a ɔno nye Kraest no mu."

column2: "Ɔno no mu na wɔdze nyansa nye nyimdzee ahonyadze nyina esie."
"Na mereka iyi amma obi aammfa adɛfɛdɛfɛsɛm annto hom brada."
"Na kaansa minnyi hɔ honam mu a
column3: menye hom wɔ hɔ wɔ sunsum mu
column4: miridzi dɛw na morohwɛ hom nhyehyɛɛ nyɛbea
column5: nye hom gyedzi a ɔwɔ Kraest mu mbrɛ osi tsim."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi dɛ mbrɛ hom gyee Kraest Jesus Ewuradze no
"hom ngye ndwow
column3: osiandɛ wɔdze hom esi no mu
column4: na hom ntsim wɔ gyedzi mu dɛ mbrɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ hom no
column5: na hom mbor do wɔ ndaase mu."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie mma obi aammfa nyansapɛ nye ndaadaa hun a ɔnam nyimpa tsetsesɛm
column3: nye wiadze esunsum mu nsɛm nkyerɛkyerɛ do

column2: "osiandɛ Kraest mu na Nyame ankasa n'amayɛ no tse wɔ nyimpadua no mu
column4: "na ɔno a ɔyɛ mpanyindzi nye tumdzi nyina hɔn tsir no mu na hom ayɛ ma."

column2: "Ɔnoara so mu na woetwa hom twatsia a wɔnndze nsa twae
column3: na dza ɔwɔ hom nyimpadua mu a woyi gu no

column2: "na dɛ woesie ɔno nye hom wɔ enuma mu
column3: no mu so na hom so nye no asoɛr ɔnam gyedzi a ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn a onyaan no fii ewufo mu no no tum adwuma do."

column2: "Na hom a nkyɛ hom ewu osian hom mfom nye hom honam a wonntwaa no twatsia ntsi
column3: hom na ɔama hom nye no enya nkwa
column4: dɛ ɔdze hɛn mfom nyina akyɛ hɛn;"

column2: "na ɔapepa ahyɛdze no mu nkyerɛwee a otsia hɛn no
column3: na ɔdze akɔbɔ mbeamudua no ho eyi no wɔ kwan mu."

column2: "Oyi na otuu mpanyindzi nye tumdzi gui no
column3: oyii hɔn kyerɛe wɔ baguamu na odzii hɔn do konyim wɔ mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma obi mmbu hom atsɛn wɔ edziban anaa anondze mu
"osiandɛ wɔyɛ ndzɛmba a ɔbɛba no ho mfonyi bi ara
"Hom mma obi nndua enyido ahobrɛadze nye abɔfosom do mma hom mbɔdzembɔ akyɛdze mmbɔ hom
column3: dɛ ɔtsena ndzɛmba a onnhu mu
column4: na ɔhoran kwa wɔ no honam adwen mu
column6: "naaso onnsuo tsir no a ofi mu na nyimpadua no nyina nam akwaa nye ntsin biara do nya edziban na ɔtoatoa mu nyin wɔ nyin a ofi Nyankopɔn mu no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom nye Kraest wui fi wiadze sunsum mu nsɛm nkyerɛkyerɛ ho a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn na hom dze ahyɛdze no to hom do
column4: dɛ hom da ho tse wiadze

column2: "Dɛm nkyerɛkyerɛ yi nyina yɛ dza ɔkyerɛ ndzɛmbahun wɔ nyimpa ahyɛdze nye nkyerɛkyerɛ afamu."
"Dza ndzɛmba yi yɛ ara nye dɛ wɔrekyerɛ nyansa wɔ enyidosom nye ahobrɛadzehun nye etsiɔdzen a wɔyɛ tsia honam; a ɔmmfa mfaso biara mmba
column3: na mbom ne nyinara yɛ dza ɔhyɛ honam akɔndɔ ma."
